DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate response rate treatment pentostatin steroid-refractory acute graft versus host disease .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Trial Pentostatin Steroid Refractory Acute Graft Versus Host Disease
DOC.criteria: Must biopsy proven grade IIIV acute GVHD refractory systemic corticosteroid No chronic GVHD Age ≥ 18 year Evidence myeloid engraftment ( ANC ≥ 0.5 x 109/l ) Performance status 03 Patients mechanical ventilation rest O2 saturation < 90 % pulseoximetry . Patients renal dialysis estimate creatinine clearance < 30 ml/min/1.73 m2 . Patients document clinical infection ( progressive symptom despite antibiotic continue fever ) enrol study infection control .
